aluth jathika githayak hadala bhasha dekakin gayana kirima, jathika kodiya aluthen nirmanaya kirima, aandukarawaraya janadhipathiwarayage niyojithayaku wanawa wenuwata maha amathiwarayage niyojithayaku bawata path kirima hewath palath sabhawa rajyaye mudunath samanga thibena sambandhathawa iwath kirima wani nirdesha ehi athulath.

saniparakshaka thuwa nomathi wima nisa pasaledi muhunadimata siduwana amihiri siduwim menma guruwarunge amanushika hasirim nisa indiyawe pasal dariyan awama washayen wasarakata thundahasak pamana siyadiwi hani karaganna bawa sankhya lekhana magin heliwi atha.

adhyayanaya paya ganana wishayayan layisthuwa niyama adhyapanaya lekhanayata mul pitapatha ha unduka puchchaya pitapathak, awasana shreniya, prayogikawa wada layisthuwa, kalina saha upadhi prashna pathra, adhyapana kriyawaliya anekuth anga;
janadhipathiwaranayak ho maha mathiwaranayak pilibandawa deshapalana karaliya thula kathabaha athi wi thibenawa.
habayi wiyali kalayata me pokunuwala jalaya tharamak aduwenawa.
